use.flag: Compile (if needed) and install Freedoom Phase 1 - Four chapters, nine levels each, totalling 36 levels. This game aims for compatibility with The Ultimate Doom mods, also known as plain Doom or Doom 1.
Compile (if needed) and install Freedoom Phase 2 - 32 levels in one long chapter, featuring extra monsters and a double-barrelled shotgun. This project aims for compatibility with Doom II mods.
Compile (if needed) and install Freedm - A 32-level game designed for competitive deathmatch play.
